meanings.sent1: The sandcastle was beachier than the one we built yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The beachier vibes of the coastal town attracted many tourists.
meanings.sent3: The beachier seashells seemed to be gossiping about the crabs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as beachier as the sunset over the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The beachier colors of the sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: The beachier umbrellas provided much-needed shade on the hot sand.
meanings.sent2: The beachier music playing in the background set a relaxing atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The beachier seagulls were having a dance party on the shore.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as beachier as the sound of waves crashing on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The beachier scent of sunscreen filled the air, reminding them of summer days.

meanings.definition: Having more qualities of a beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachier decor in the restaurant made customers feel like they were dining by the sea.
meanings.sent2: The beachier attire of the surfers made them stand out on the waves.
meanings.sent3: The beachier sand seemed to sparkle under the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as beachier as the seashell she held to her ear.
meanings.sent5: The beachier atmosphere of the party made everyone feel carefree and relaxed.
